#include<algorithm>
#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<vector>
#include<fstream>
#include<iomanip>
#include<bitset>
#include<deque>
#include<queue>
#include<string>
#include<map>
#include<cstring>
#include<sstream>
#include<cmath>
#include<ctime>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int T;
	scanf("%d", &T);
	vector<int> num;
	for (int t = 0; t < T; t++)
	{
		num.clear();
		string temp;
		cin >> temp;
		if (temp.size() == 1)
		{
			cout << temp << endl;
			continue;
		}
		string str = temp;
		int count = 0, newnum;
		
		while (count < temp.size()-1)
		{
			stringstream ss;
			str = str.substr(1)+str.substr(0,1);
			//cout << str << endl;
			newnum = atoi(str.c_str());
			num.push_back(newnum);
			ss << newnum;
			str = ss.str();
			count++;
		}
		str = temp;
		count = 0;
		while (count < temp.size()-1)
		{
			stringstream ss;
			str = str.substr(str.size()-1)+str.substr(0,str.size()-1);
			//cout << str << endl;
			newnum = atoi(str.c_str());
			num.push_back(newnum);
			ss << newnum;
			str = ss.str();
			count++;
		}
		stringstream ss1, ss2;
		str = temp;
		str = str.substr(1)+str.substr(0,1);
		newnum = atoi(str.c_str());
		ss1 << newnum;
		str = ss1.str();
		str = str.substr(str.size()-1)+str.substr(0,str.size()-1);
		newnum = atoi(str.c_str());
		num.push_back(newnum);

		str = temp;
		str = str.substr(str.size()-1)+str.substr(0,str.size()-1);
		newnum = atoi(str.c_str());
		ss2 << newnum;
		str = ss2.str();
		str = str.substr(1)+str.substr(0,1);
		newnum = atoi(str.c_str());
		num.push_back(newnum);

		int max = 0;
		for (int i = 0; i < num.size(); i++)
		{
			if (num[i] > max)
				max = num[i];
		}
		printf("%d\n", max);
	}
	return 0;
}
